attributes.action: Put sighns in place around oxenholme helmside Road about speed limits
attributes.additional_details: Someone is going to get seriously hurt or killed with the speed of the vehicles  Especially larger vehicles tractors and wagons.
attributes.background: We need large sighns putting through the village reminding the the large traffic flow of the speed limit.

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions about local road signs are a matter for the relevant local authority, not the UK Government or Parliament.

You could raise your issue with a local councillor who represents you. You can find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them, by entering your post code here:
https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
